name: Witch One
description:
Hi, This is my first game yay ....     I wish it wasn't hahaha joking. ok so the game is called Witch One, it's a Local 2 player  game. The title of the game is really the game play "Which One" The player play as the Witch trying to find the other player which play as the mouse. The mouse player's goal is try to stop the witch from completing the ritual by rescuing his friends. 

Have fun, Many thanks :P
